page.title: 05GARDENING ON AN ALLOTMENT
page.content: We interviewed a{gardener}and asked him some questions. He showed us round his hut. It looked nice and cosy with a kettle there for a nice cup of tea or coffee. He didn't build the hut, that was already there. He brought a few things into the hut and painted it green and white. He has owned the allotment for 17 years and it is in good condition. He has lots of {greenhouses}and says that he likes growing food to make a little money. He was growing{green beans, tomatoes {(in a greenhouse), cabbages & runner {beans.}He likes growing food more than flowers and spends five or six hours a day on the allotment (except Saturday & Sunday).
